your-info.permanent_resident_card: PHOTO (only if non US resident) - DB: stored in application_files table, referenced by permanent_resident_card_file_id
your-info.ssn: SECURITY: Hashed using SHA-256 with pepper via hash_ssn() function. Original NEVER stored. DB column: ssn_hash

spouses._note: Current spouse comes first. Prior spouses only included if marriage > 10 years or ended in death. DB: stored as JSONB array
spouses.spouse_ssn: SECURITY: Hashed like primary SSN. Store as spouse_ssn_hash in JSONB
spouses.marriage_end_date: optional (prior will have it, current won't)

children._note: DB: stored as JSONB array in applications.children column

direct_deposit._note: DB: type stored in direct_deposit_type enum column. Details in direct_deposit_domestic or direct_deposit_international JSONB columns

domestic.account_type: only present if type is domestic - DB enum: checking|savings
domestic.account_number: SECURITY: Should be encrypted at application layer before storing

international.country: only present if type is international
international.account_number: SECURITY: Should be encrypted at application layer before storing

contact_who_knows_your_condition._note: DB: stored as JSONB in applications.emergency_contact column

employment._note: All employment data stored as JSONB columns in applications table

earnings_history._note: DB: stored in applications.earnings_history JSONB array

military_service._note: DB: served_in_us_military is BOOLEAN column, service_records is JSONB array

employment_history._note: DB: non_self_employment stored in applications.employment_history JSONB, self_employment in applications.self_employment_history JSONB

education._note: DB: stored in applications.education JSONB array

special_education._note: DB: stored in applications.special_education JSONB array

job_training._note: DB: stored in applications.job_training JSONB array

disability_benefits_filed_or_received._note: DB: stored in applications.disability_benefits JSONB array. Type, status, payment_type, payer are DB enums

medical._note: All medical data stored as JSONB columns in applications table

conditions._note: DB: stored in applications.conditions JSONB array with GIN index for searching

functional_limitations._note: DB: stored in applications.functional_limitations JSONB object

healthcare_providers._note: DB: stored in applications.healthcare_providers JSONB array

tests._note: DB: stored in applications.medical_tests JSONB array

medications._note: DB: stored in applications.medications JSONB array. Type is DB enum: prescription|non_prescription

evidence_documents._note: DB: stored in applications.evidence_documents JSONB array with file_id references to application_files table. Document_type is DB enum
evidence_documents.file: PDF or image - DB: reference to application_files.id UUID

other_record_sources._note: DB: stored in applications.other_record_sources JSONB array. Type is DB enum
other_record_sources.contact_info: optional - address, phone, case number if applicable

documents._note: All document files stored in Supabase Storage bucket 'application-files'. Metadata tracked in application_files table. References stored as UUIDs in applications table
documents.birth_certificate: PDF or image - proof of birth - DB: applications.birth_certificate_file_id UUID
documents.citizenship_proof: PDF or image - only if not born in US (passport, naturalization certificate, permanent resident card, etc.) - DB: applications.citizenship_proof_file_id UUID
documents.military_discharge_papers: PDF or image - DD-214 or equivalent, only if served before 1968 - DB: applications.military_discharge_papers_file_id UUID

w2_forms._note: DB: stored in applications.w2_forms JSONB array with file_id references
w2_forms.file: PDF or image - DB: reference to application_files.id UUID

self_employment_tax_returns._note: DB: stored in applications.self_employment_tax_returns JSONB array with file_id references
self_employment_tax_returns.file: PDF - DB: reference to application_files.id UUID

workers_comp_proof._note: DB: stored in applications.workers_comp_proof JSONB array with file_id references. Type is DB enum
workers_comp_proof.file: PDF or image - DB: reference to application_files.id UUID
